titles.title: Federal Law Enforcement Training Center Protection Act of 2010
To withdraw certain land in the State of New Mexico, and for other purposes.
Federal Law Enforcement Training Center Protection Act of 2010

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

bill.summary: Federal Law Enforcement Training Center Protection Act of 2010 - Reserves for 20 years certain federal land for use by the Department of Homeland Security (DHS) for the Federal Law Enforcement Training Center in Eddy County, New Mexico.
